sections.heading: Ability to build, finance and operate toll roads9-499
sections.text: 08.Ability to build, finance and operate toll roadsNotwithstanding section 28-6805, subsection C, a city or town may construct, operate and finance the construction of toll roads within the corporate limits of the city or town.

sections.heading: to build, finance and operate toll roads
